toasts.favorites-error: An error occured while fetching your favorite cocktails from a server
toasts.shelf-error: An error occured while fetching cocktails you can make from a server
toasts.stats-error: An error occured while fetching stats from a server
toasts.list-error: An error occured while fetching ingredients on your shopping list from a server

ingredient.title: Ingredient
ingredient.on-shopping-list: You have this ingredient on shopping list
ingredient.delete-confirm: This will permanently delete ingredient with name "{name}". This action will modify {total} cocktail recipes.
ingredient.is-variety: Ingredient is variety of another ingredient
ingredient.extra-cocktails: Add to shelf and you can make

dialog.search-not-found: Not found what you are looking for?

ingredient.complex-note: If you have all of the listed ingredients, automatically match recipes with this ingredient
ingredient.variety-note: Recipe matching will include the parent ingredient as a substitute (depending on user settings)
ingredient.shelf-bar-help: Recipes matching ingredients in bar shelf will be shown to all bar members.
ingredient.shelf-user-help: Recipes matching ingredients in your shelf can only be managed by you.
ingredient.units-help: Some features work the best if you use common units. Some recommendations for units are: ml, oz, cl, dashes, barspoon, drops, topup, leaves.

users.title: Users
users.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete user with name "{name}".

missing.ingredients: Ingredients you are missing will be shown here.
missing-favorites: All cocktails you favorited are going to be right here.
name: Name

placeholder.cocktail-garnish: Something to make a cocktail pop...
placeholder.site-search: Search for a cocktail or ingredient...
placeholder.image-copyright: Image source URL or other reference...

imageupload.browse: Click here to browse for images.
imageupload.validation: PNG, JPG, WEBP or GIF · Max 100MB
imageupload.delete-confirm: This will permanently remove the image.
imageupload.error: An error occured while uploading images.

confirm-dialog.title: Are you sure?
units-help-text: Use "oz", "cl", "ml" for common fluid units to enable unit conversion on cocktail page.

category.title: Category
category.confirm-delete: This will permanently category with name "{name}".

tag.help-text: Separate multiple tags with a comma (",").
tag.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete tag with name "{name}".

glass-type.title: Glass type
glass-type.confirm-delete: This will permanently glass type with name "{name}".

toasts.copy-fail: Unable to write link to clipboard

register-success: You are now registered, you can now login with your information
register-success-email: You are now registered, check your email for account confirmation

note.title: Note
note.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete selected note.

generate-image-dialog.generation-failed: Error occured trying to generate an image

collections.title: Collections
collections.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete collection with name "{name}".
collections.confirm-remove-cocktail: Are you sure you want to remove cocktail from collection?
collections.add-from-query: Add to collection from current filters
collections.share-in-bar: Share collection with all bar members

subtitle: Subtitle
delete-my-account: Delete my account and my data

auth.confirm-logout: Are you sure you want to sign out of your current session?
auth.password-forgot-help-text: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset setup a new password.
auth.reset-email-sent: If an account is registered with this email, it will receive a message with password reset link.

utensils.title: Utensils
utensils.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete utensil with name "{name}".

bars.title: Bars
bars.empty: You don't have any bars. To start adding recipes and ingredients you need to create or join at least one bar.
bars.join-notice: To join existing bar you need an invite code. Ask the bar owner to send you one and paste it in the input below.
bars.invite-link-error: Unable to copy invite link to clipboard
bars.confirm-delete: This will permanently delete bar with name "{name}".
bars.confirm-leave: You will lose all your data in bar ("{name}") if you leave it.
bars.confirm-activation: Are you sure you want to activate "{name}"? On free plan you can have only one bar activated, you will not be able to activate any other bars.

cocktail-no-collection: This cocktail is not in any of your collections

import.manual-match-notice: Select ingredient that best matches "{ name }", or create a new one.
import.type-collection-description: Import from Bar Assistant JSON collection
import.notice: Existing ingredients, methods and glassware will be matched by their name (case insensitive). If ingredient does not exist, it will be created.
import.type-csv-text-description: Import by pasting the CSV structure

profile-public-shelf: Make cocktails in my shelf public to all bar members
profile-use-parent-as-substitute: Track parent ingredients as a substitutes

description.Admin: Complete access to all bar settings
description.Moderator: Can manage cocktails, ingredients and some bar settings
description.Guest: Can view, rate and favorite cocktails

billing.title: Billing
billing.is_active: Your subscription for "{name}" plan is currently active
billing.next_bill_at: Your next payment will be on
billing.end_at: You ended your subscription, you will have access to your current plan until
billing.confirm-sub-update-pause: This action will end your subscription which you can resume at any time. You will have full access to your plan until the end of the current subscription.
billing.confirm-sub-update-resume: This action will resume your subscription. If your subscription is not active anymore you will be charged as per plan pricing.

menu.title: Menu
menu.cocktail-already-added: Cocktail "{name}" is already in the menu
menu.delete-cocktail-confirm: This will remove cocktail "{name}" from menu category
menu.description: Here you can set up a simple web menu for your bar. You can update your bar link when adding or editing a bar. Use the URL or QR code to share your bar menu with the guests.
menu.no-cocktails-added: Menu needs to have at least one cocktail
menu.clear-category-confirm: This will remove all cocktails from category "{name}"
menu.add-shelf-cocktails: Add missing cocktails from bar shelf

bar.url-help: Your public bar URL will be: {url}

api.token-notice: Please save this API token somewhere safe and accessible. For security reasons, you won't be able to view it again. If you lose this API token, you'll need to generate a new one.

exports.title: Exports
exports.empty: You don't have any available exports
exports.export-notice: Please keep in mind that depending on server configuration and selected bar size, generating export can take several minutes.
exports.confirm-delete: This will delete the selected export file
exports.types-hint: Click here to learn more about export types

cocktail.missing-ing-action: Add missing ingredients to my shopping list
cocktail.missing-ing-complex: Missing, but you can make it with ingredients in your shelf
cocktail.missing-ing-sub-available: Missing, but you have substitutes available
cocktail.confirm-copy: This will create a copy of "{name}"

price.currency-format-notice: Currency must be in ISO 4271 (Alpha3) format
price.category-confirm-delete: This will permanently price category with name \"{name}\".

target-pour-cost-help: Percentage of the cocktail's selling price that comes from the cost of the ingredients.

calculators.title: Calculators
calculators.delete-confirm: This will permanently delete calculator with name "{name}".
calculators.empty: There are no calculators added yet
calculators.inputs-description: In this section, you define all your required inputs that will change the result of your evaluations. Each input can be used in all evaluations.
calculators.evaluations-description: In this section, you define your evaluations and their result display settings. Each evaluation can access and use all previously defined inputs and evaluation results in expression using defined variable name.
